caption.p: Rot incidence in nectarines ‘Sweet Red’ ( a) and peaches ‘Vista Rich’ ( b) treated with essential oil biofumigation and pathogen incidence (%) at the end of shelf life (5 days at 20 °C after 28 days of cold storage). Values of the same storage trial, followed by the same letter, are not statistically different by Tukey’s Test ( p < 0.05).
